data.name: AIRPORT_CONFIRMED
data.value: Thats perfect! Can you tell me what your destination is?

data.name: AIRPORT_NOT_CONFIRMED
data.value: Thats fine, please let me know which airport are you flying from.

data.name: AIRPORT_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Hmm... I can't find that particular airport do you have the airport code for it or do you want me to try and find another airport

data.name: DATE_CONFIRMED
data.value: We are off to a flying start! Here are some flights that I have found to {DESTINATION} on the {DATE}.

data.name: DECLINE
data.value: No thanks

data.name: DESTINATION_NOT_AVAILIBLE
data.value: I've checked for flights from {AIRPORT} to {DESTINATION} and it looks like that airport isn't servicing that destination right now. Can you tell me the name of another airport that you'd like to travel from?

data.name: DESTINATON_CONFIRMED
data.value: Super! What date are you planning on flying to {DESTINATION}?

data.name: FOUND_FLIGHTS
data.value: I found these flights going from {AIRPORT} to {DESTINATION} on {FLIGHT_DATE}.

data.name: FOUND_MANY_AIRPORTS
data.value: I've found these airports near you. Which one are you traveling from?

data.name: FOUND_NO_AIRPORTS
data.value: Hmm... I can't find any nearby airports. Can you tell me where you will be flying from?

data.name: FOUND_ONE_AIRPORT
data.value: Hmm... it looks like the closest airport to you is:

data.name: FOUND_RETURN_FLIGHTS
data.value: I have found these flights going from {AIRPORT} to {DESTINATION} on {FLIGHT_DATE}, retuning on {RETURN_DATE}

data.name: INVALID_RETURN_DATE
data.value: I'm sorry but your return date {RETURN_DATE} has to be after your travel date {FLIGHT_DATE}. Can you choose a new return date for me?

data.name: NONE_OF_THESE
data.value: None of these options

data.name: NO_FLIGHTS_FOUND
data.value: Unfortunatly, I can't find any flights from {AIRPORT} to {DESTINATION} on {DATE}. Please enter a new date and, I'll search again or you can tell me in plain English where you'd like to go and the airport that you are traveling from.

data.name: NO_OTHER_AIRPORTS_NEARBY
data.value: Please tell me of another airport that you would like me to search for availible flight from?

data.name: NO_SUITABLE_FLIGHTS
data.value: None of these are sutible

data.name: RECONFIRM_DATE
data.value: Hmm... I don't see any flights leaving {DESTINATION} on the {FLIGHT_DATE}. Can you please chose a differnt date?

data.name: RESTART_MESSAGE
data.value: That's not a problem, I'll try to help you find a differnt flight. {AIRPORT_RESPONSE}

data.name: RETURN_FLIGHT_ASK
data.value: I have found flights for {DESTINATION} on {FLIGHT_DATE}. Do you want me to look up return Flights from {DESTINATION} as well?

data.name: SOME_OTHER_AIRPORTS_NEARBY
data.value: I had found these other airports near you. Do you want me to check them for flights going to {DESTINATION}?

data.name: WELCOME_MESSAGE
data.value: Hi there, I'd like to help you find flights. {AIRPORT_RESPONSE}
